| Overview                = The '''Seraphim''' are the fifth choir of [[Angels (Monotheism)|Angels]] per their hierarchy in [[Judaism]], and a choir of the [[First Sphere]] per [[Christianity]], along with the [[Cherubim (Angels) (Earth-616)|Cherubim]] and the [[Council of Thrones (Earth-616)|Thrones]].{{r|Marvel Zombies: The Book of Angels, Demons & Various Monstrosities #1|; [[Angels (Monotheism)|Angels]]' entry}}

Many Seraphim appear to be [[Archangels (Earth-616)|Archangels]], which suggest that Archangel is more a title than a rank.{{r|Marvel Zombies: The Book of Angels, Demons & Various Monstrosities #1|; Angels' entry}}

The Seraphim seemingly associated themselves with the Cherubim among [[Seraphim and Cherubim, Inc. (Earth-616)|Seraphim and Cherubim, Inc.]].{{r|Bizarre Adventures #34}}
